articles.title: Here's What to Expect From Lockheed Martin's Next Earnings Report
articles.mainIdea: Here's What to Expect From Lockheed Martin's Next Earnings Report
articles.summary: Barchart: Here's What to Expect From Lockheed Martin's Next Earnings Report. Lockheed Martin is scheduled to announce its fourth-quarter results soon, and analysts forecast a double-digit decrease in the company’s bottom-line figure. Related tickers mentioned: LMT.
